document_data.name: Ardred Briferhew
document_data.mainbody: '''Ardred Briferhew''' was a veteran caravan master just before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Activities: Ardred worked for the [[High Road Charter Company]] with the role of managing the caravan traffic to points north of the city.
document_data.History: At the start of the Tyranny of Dragons in [[1489 DR]] Ardred led a great caravan that, unbeknownst to him, was full of agents of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] transporting treasures for the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
